content: as a native long islander i have always been obsessed with all things nautical and although i now find myself in the midwest i have recently moved to a house two blocks away from the shores of lake erie and a lighthouse my maritime obsession had been rekindled and it has become my mission to create knits any respectable seaman would be proud to wear knitted with a worsted weight yarn the fisher cable hat is a relatively quick and easy project it is worked from the bottom up and is mellow enough for a beginning knitter the cabled ribbing adds a little spice but is perfect for learning to cable although this nautical-inspired hat was designed for my favorite fisherman it looks great on fisherwomen too
